short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pledge allegiance to the rightful Kim in the North on every page in WWWesteros!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces the name of our glorious leader on all webpages with his rightful title as Kim in the North!

Inspired by the "Drumpfinator" chrome extension.
